detail_desc: Strapless satin dress with draping at the bust and a cut-out section and wide, horizontal elasticated strap at the back. Hook and eye fasteners and a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 50x180 cm.
Blouse in soft slub cotton jersey with a V-shaped opening at the top, a small, smocked stand-up collar and long raglan sleeves with smocking at the cuffs.
5-pocket jeans in hard-washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and slightly wider, tapered legs with raw-edge hems.
Sun hat in patterned, UV-protective fabric with ties under the chin. UPF 50.
Chinos in washed stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly. Side pockets, a coin pocket, fake back pockets and slim legs.
Court shoes in imitation suede with rounded toes and covered block heels. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 6.5 cm.
Windbreaker in a crispy weave with a mesh-lined hood and a drawstring at the top and hem. Zip down the front, diagonal front pockets and covered elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
Soft slippers with elastication around the opening and soft, imitation leather soles.
Jumper in a soft knit with a ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Chinos in stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and straight legs.
Joggers in a soft, fine-knit cotton and cashmere blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
T-shirt in soft, ribbed jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline and overlocked edges.
Running vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a gently rounded hem.

Set with a hooded jacket and pair of trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend. Jacket with a diagonal zip with a chin guard and padded detail at the front and a hood with a patterned lining. Trousers with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist.
Short shorts in woven fabric with side pockets and a high waist with wide elastic.
Cardigan knitted in soft, garter-stitched cotton with buttons down the front and long sleeves.
Fitted, gathered top in jersey with a V-neck, vertical seams down the front and back and long sleeves.
Slim-fit trousers in soft, narrow-wale cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud and front and back pockets.
Kaftan in airy chiffon with pompom trims. V-neck and a drawstring at the waist with tassels on the ends.
Ankle-length treggings in supersoft corduroy. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist, a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Blouse in a soft, airy, patterned viscose weave with long, wide sleeves and narrow, buttoned cuffs. V-neck with ties at the top, a gathered seam under the bust and a flared peplum.
Elasticated scrunchie in woven fabric with a scarf detail.
Ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, back pockets and skinny legs.
Hat knitted in soft cashmere with a roll edge.
Long-sleeved jumper in jacquard-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Lined, non-wired bikini top with a cut-out section at the front and narrow shoulder straps. No fasteners.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, pockets in the side seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Slides in imitation leather with twisted straps at the front. Imitation leather linings and insoles.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with contrasting colour trims. Elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Satin tie. Width 6.5 cm.
Cardigan in soft, organic cotton jersey with a hood, chest pocket and press-studs down the front.
Short-sleeved T-shirt in stretch cotton jersey. Muscle fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s natural physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Long satin dress with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and 3/4-length sleeves. Seam with a tie at the waist and a draped, asymmetric skirt with a flounce at the hem. Lined.
Short slip dress in satin with lace details, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a V-neck and short slits in the sides. Unlined.

Hoodie in lightweight sweatshirt fabric and a pair of leggings in cotton jersey. Hoodie with a print motif on the front, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Leggings with covered elastication at the waist.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in ribbed jersey.
Maxi dress in woven fabric with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps. Elasticated seam at the waist and a straight-cut, softly draping skirt with high slits in the sides.

Push-up bra in lace with decorative trims, underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastener at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit with long raglan sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a rib-knit flounce at the hem.
Metal rings in various designs, one decorated with rhinestones.
5-pocket trousers in washed cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a button.
Socks in a soft, rib-knit wool blend with elasticated tops.
Flared blouse in a patterned, crinkled weave with a small stand-up collar and gathered yoke. Buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Knee-length dress in an airy, patterned weave with a tie collar and an opening at the front. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Backpack in woven fabric with a handle and adjustable, padded shoulder straps. Zip at the top, a zipped outer compartment and two inner compartments, one with a zip. Padded back plate and base. Lined. Size 13.5x28.5x43 cm.
Knee-length dress in slightly stretchy cotton satin with a collar, buttons down the front and short sleeves with narrow ties. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Sleeveless dresses in soft cotton jersey with a seam at the top and a gathered, gently flared skirt.
Hole-patterned, triangle bikini top with removable inserts, a pompom trim around the neckline, and ties at the back and back of the neck.
Top in supersoft jersey with a brushed finish. Low dropped shoulders, long, cuffed sleeves, and slits in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Vest top in ribbed jersey. Narrow cut at the top with short shoulder straps and a racer back. The cotton content of the top is organic.

Trousers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated waist, pockets in the side seams, a back pocket and elasticated hems. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the sweatpants is organic.
Sandals with narrow foot straps and fluted soles. Heel 1 cm.
Warm-lined boots with a rubber lower section, fabric shaft, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Short-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and a gently rounded hem.
Round-necked T-shirt in heavy cotton jersey with a print motif. Relaxed fit with a narrow, ribbed trim around the neckline.
Shorts in woven fabric with a high waist, pleats at the front, zip fly and hook-and-eye fastening. Sewn-in belt, side pockets and fake back pockets.
Playsuit in a patterned weave with narrow shoulder straps and elastication around the top. Elasticated seam at the waist and a long, sewn-on cape with an asymmetric hem.
Fitted sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back.
Slim-fit chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side and back pockets. Legs with decorative stitching, quilted sections and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Trousers in woven fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, a zip fly and a hook-and-eye fastening, side pockets and a welt back pocket. Relaxed Fit – a fit with good room for movement creating a comfortable, relaxed silhouette.
Calf-length, A-line dress in an airy weave. V-neck with a flounced trim that continues over the shoulder straps, and covered elastication at the top of the back. Unlined.
Wide, ankle-length trousers in a cotton and linen weave with a zip fly and button, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Long-sleeved, one-shoulder top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the top, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Balconette bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust and provide extra-firm support. Silicone trim at the top, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Short dress in jacquard-weave satin with a V-neck and wrapover top with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Long sleeves with narrow, covered elastication and a flounce at the cuffs, a seam and covered elastication at the waist, and a circular skirt with a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Fitted top in soft organic cotton jersey with short sleeves.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a high collar, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and welt side pockets with a concealed press-stud. Elastication at the cuffs and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Lined. Polyester filling.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.

Short-sleeved shirt in a softly draping, patterned viscose and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front, yoke at the back and rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Pull-on jeans in printed stretch denim with elastication and a small frill at the waist, a fake fly and fake front pockets. Loose fit with gently tapered legs and elasticated hems.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Long dolman sleeves with contrasting colour stripes down the sides.
Fitted top in a fine rib knit with long sleeves and a ribbed neckline.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with a sequined motif on the front. Long sleeves, short slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Short lace dress with inset lace panels down the top and at the waistband, a concealed zip in the side and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short sleeves with frilled trims and a skirt with frills at the hem. Lined front and skirt.
